All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme3.app.state.AppState, de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.ScreenController
public class HudScreenController
extends AbstractScreenController

Players man "hud" screen within the game.

Author:
Bernd Spaeth, Wladimir Spindler and Saman Sedighi Rad

showActions

public void showActions(Movable unit)
Toggles the visibility of the panels which provide the buttons for the player's actions. For example, when the player has selected a path he will see the undo button, otherwise not, same for fight and trade buttons for units that are next to the player.

Parameters:
unit -

hideActions

public void hideActions()
Completely hides the players panels hich allow actions.

lockHudElements

public void lockHudElements()
During the players movement for example any other action is locked. This method allows to lock all buttons that allow you to run an action, like walking of following.
